verses.text: \w Then|strong="H5414"\w* \w it|strong="H5414"\w* \w was|strong="H4428"\w* \w reported|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* Joab, “\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w is|strong="H4310"\w* \w weeping|strong="H1058"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* mourning \w over|strong="H5921"\w* Absalom.”

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w that|strong="H4428"\w* day’s victory \w was|strong="H4428"\w* turned \w into|strong="H5921"\w* mourning \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w all|strong="H1058"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* people, \w because|strong="H5921"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H4428"\w* day \w they|strong="H5921"\w* \w were|strong="H4428"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w*, “\w The|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w is|strong="H2009"\w* grieving \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* son.”

\w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* returned \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w city|strong="H1931"\w* quietly \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w*, \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* steal \w away|strong="H3605"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* humiliation \w after|strong="H5921"\w* fleeing \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w battle|strong="H3117"\w*.

\w But|strong="H1931"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* king covered \w his|strong="H3117"\w* face \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w cried|strong="H5892"\w* \w out|strong="H5127"\w* \w at|strong="H4421"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* top \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w his|strong="H3117"\w* voice, “\w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w my|strong="H1589"\w* son Absalom! \w O|strong="H3068"\w* Absalom, \w my|strong="H1589"\w* son, \w my|strong="H1589"\w* son!”

\w Then|strong="H4428"\w* Joab \w went|strong="H4428"\w* into \w the|strong="H6440"\w* house \w and|strong="H1121"\w* said \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, “Today \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* disgraced \w all|strong="H1419"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* \w servants|strong="H6440"\w* \w who|strong="H1121"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* saved \w your|strong="H6440"\w* life \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* lives \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w daughters|strong="H1121"\w*, \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* wives, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w your|strong="H6440"\w* concubines.

\w You|strong="H6440"\w* love \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* hate \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* hate \w those|strong="H3605"\w* \w who|strong="H3605"\w* love \w you|strong="H6440"\w*! \w For|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* \w made|strong="H3605"\w* \w it|strong="H6440"\w* \w clear|strong="H3605"\w* \w today|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* commanders \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w soldiers|strong="H5650"\w* mean \w nothing|strong="H3605"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* \w you|strong="H6440"\w*. \w I|strong="H3117"\w* know \w today|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w if|strong="H1121"\w* Absalom \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w alive|strong="H5315"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w us|strong="H6440"\w* \w were|strong="H1121"\w* \w dead|strong="H5315"\w*, \w it|strong="H6440"\w* \w would|strong="H5315"\w* \w have|strong="H1121"\w* pleased \w you|strong="H6440"\w*!

\w Now|strong="H3117"\w* \w therefore|strong="H3588"\w* get \w up|strong="H3605"\w*! Go \w out|strong="H3045"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* speak comfort \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w servants|strong="H5650"\w*, \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w swear|strong="H3588"\w* \w by|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w if|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w do|strong="H5869"\w* \w not|strong="H3045"\w* go \w out|strong="H3045"\w*, \w not|strong="H3045"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w man|strong="H4191"\w* \w will|strong="H5650"\w* remain \w with|strong="H3045"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* tonight. \w This|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H5650"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* worse \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w than|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* adversity \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H5650"\w* befallen \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w from|strong="H3117"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* youth \w until|strong="H3588"\w* \w now|strong="H3117"\w*!” David Restored as King

\w So|strong="H3318"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H5921"\w* \w got|strong="H6965"\w* \w up|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* sat \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* gate, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H1696"\w* \w were|strong="H5650"\w* \w told|strong="H1696"\w*: “Behold, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H5921"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* sitting \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* gate.” \w So|strong="H3318"\w* \w they|strong="H3588"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w came|strong="H3318"\w* \w before|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H5921"\w*. \w Meanwhile|strong="H3318"\w*, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Israelites \w had|strong="H3068"\w* fled, \w each|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H7451"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w home|strong="H3068"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w people|strong="H5971"\w* \w throughout|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* tribes \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w were|strong="H3478"\w* arguing, “\w The|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* rescued \w us|strong="H5046"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* hand \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w our|strong="H3605"\w* \w enemies|strong="H6965"\w* \w and|strong="H6965"\w* delivered \w us|strong="H5046"\w* \w from|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* hand \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Philistines, \w but|strong="H2009"\w* \w now|strong="H2009"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* \w has|strong="H3478"\w* \w fled|strong="H5127"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H6440"\w* \w because|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Absalom.

\w But|strong="H1961"\w* Absalom, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w* \w we|strong="H3068"\w* anointed \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w us|strong="H5921"\w*, \w has|strong="H1961"\w* died \w in|strong="H5921"\w* battle. \w So|strong="H4480"\w* \w why|strong="H5921"\w* \w do|strong="H3605"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w say|strong="H3478"\w* \w nothing|strong="H3605"\w* \w about|strong="H1961"\w* restoring \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*?”

\w Then|strong="H6258"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* David \w sent|strong="H7725"\w* \w this|strong="H6258"\w* message \w to|strong="H7725"\w* Zadok \w and|strong="H7725"\w* Abiathar, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* priests: “\w Say|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* elders \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Judah, ‘\w Why|strong="H4100"\w* \w should|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H5921"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* last \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w restore|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* palace, \w since|strong="H6258"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* talk \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w all|strong="H5921"\w* \w Israel|strong="H4421"\w* \w has|strong="H4428"\w* \w reached|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w at|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H7725"\w* quarters?

\w You|strong="H3605"\w* \w are|strong="H3478"\w* \w my|strong="H3605"\w* brothers, \w my|strong="H3605"\w* \w own|strong="H1961"\w* flesh \w and|strong="H3063"\w* blood. \w So|strong="H7971"\w* \w why|strong="H4100"\w* \w should|strong="H4100"\w* \w you|strong="H3605"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* last \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w restore|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*?’

\w And|strong="H7725"\w* \w say|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* Amasa, ‘Aren’t \w you|strong="H7725"\w* \w my|strong="H7725"\w* \w flesh|strong="H1320"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* blood? \w May|strong="H1961"\w* God punish \w me|strong="H7725"\w*, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w ever|strong="H7725"\w* \w so|strong="H1961"\w* severely, \w if|strong="H1961"\w* \w from|strong="H7725"\w* \w this|strong="H7725"\w* \w time|strong="H1961"\w* \w you|strong="H7725"\w* \w are|strong="H6106"\w* \w not|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* commander \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w my|strong="H7725"\w* army \w in|strong="H4428"\w* \w place|strong="H1961"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Joab!’”

\w So|strong="H6213"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* swayed \w the|strong="H3605"\w* hearts \w of|strong="H3117"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H6213"\w* \w of|strong="H3117"\w* Judah \w as|strong="H3117"\w* though \w they|strong="H3117"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w one|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H3605"\w*, \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w they|strong="H3117"\w* sent word \w to|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H6440"\w*: “\w Return|strong="H8478"\w*, \w you|strong="H6440"\w* \w and|strong="H3117"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w your|strong="H3605"\w* \w servants|strong="H6440"\w*.”

\w So|strong="H7971"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w*, \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w when|strong="H7725"\w* \w he|strong="H3605"\w* arrived \w at|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Jordan, \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w men|strong="H5650"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w came|strong="H7725"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* Gilgal \w to|strong="H7725"\w* meet \w him|strong="H7971"\w* \w and|strong="H3063"\w* \w escort|strong="H7971"\w* \w him|strong="H7971"\w* across \w the|strong="H3605"\w* Jordan. Shimei Pardoned

\w Then|strong="H7725"\w* Shimei son \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Gera, \w a|strong="H3068"\w* Benjamite \w from|strong="H7725"\w* Bahurim, hurried \w down|strong="H3212"\w* \w with|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* men \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* \w King|strong="H4428"\w* David,

\w along|strong="H5973"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* thousand \w men|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Benjamin|strong="H1145"\w*, \w as|strong="H3063"\w* \w well|strong="H5973"\w* \w as|strong="H3063"\w* Ziba \w the|strong="H5973"\w* \w steward|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5973"\w* house \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Saul \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w his|strong="H1732"\w* fifteen \w sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* twenty servants. \w They|strong="H3063"\w* rushed \w down|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* \w the|strong="H5973"\w* Jordan \w before|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H5973"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*

\w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w crossed|strong="H3383"\w* \w at|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* ford \w to|strong="H6440"\w* carry \w over|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*’s \w household|strong="H1004"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w to|strong="H6440"\w* do what \w was|strong="H7586"\w* \w good|strong="H6743"\w* \w in|strong="H1004"\w* \w his|strong="H6440"\w* \w sight|strong="H6440"\w*. \w When|strong="H1121"\w* Shimei \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Gera \w crossed|strong="H3383"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w Jordan|strong="H3383"\w*, \w he|strong="H2568"\w* fell \w down|strong="H6440"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*

\w and|strong="H1121"\w* said, “\w My|strong="H6213"\w* lord, \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H6213"\w* \w hold|strong="H6213"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w* guilty, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w not|strong="H6213"\w* remember \w your|strong="H6440"\w* servant’s wrongdoing \w on|strong="H5674"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* day \w my|strong="H6213"\w* lord \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w left|strong="H5674"\w* Jerusalem. \w May|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w not|strong="H6213"\w* \w take|strong="H5674"\w* \w it|strong="H6213"\w* \w to|strong="H6213"\w* heart.

\w For|strong="H3117"\w* \w your|strong="H7760"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* knows \w that|strong="H3117"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* \w have|strong="H5650"\w* sinned, \w so|strong="H3318"\w* \w here|strong="H7760"\w* \w I|strong="H3117"\w* am \w today|strong="H3117"\w* \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w first|strong="H3117"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w all|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3117"\w* house \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Joseph \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w come|strong="H3318"\w* \w down|strong="H7760"\w* \w to|strong="H3318"\w* \w meet|strong="H3318"\w* \w my|strong="H7760"\w* lord \w the|strong="H3117"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.”

\w But|strong="H3588"\w* Abishai son \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Zeruiah said, “Shouldn’t Shimei \w be|strong="H3117"\w* \w put|strong="H3381"\w* \w to|strong="H3381"\w* death \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w this|strong="H3588"\w*, \w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* cursed \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w LORD|strong="H3068"\w*’s anointed?”

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* David \w replied|strong="H6030"\w*, “\w Sons|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Zeruiah|strong="H6870"\w*, \w what|strong="H2063"\w* \w have|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w do|strong="H3068"\w* \w with|strong="H3068"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w you|strong="H3588"\w* \w should|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w my|strong="H3068"\w* adversaries today? \w Should|strong="H3068"\w* \w any|strong="H3588"\w* \w man|strong="H1121"\w* \w be|strong="H4191"\w* \w put|strong="H4191"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w death|strong="H4191"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* Israel today? \w Am|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w indeed|strong="H3588"\w* aware \w that|strong="H3588"\w* today \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H3068"\w* king \w over|strong="H3068"\w* Israel?”

\w So|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* said \w to|strong="H3478"\w* Shimei, “\w You|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.” \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* swore \w an|strong="H1961"\w* oath \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w*. Mephibosheth Excused

\w Then|strong="H4428"\w* \w Mephibosheth|strong="H3808"\w*, Saul’s grandson, \w went|strong="H4428"\w* down \w to|strong="H4191"\w* meet \w the|strong="H4191"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*. \w He|strong="H3808"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* cared \w for|strong="H4191"\w* \w his|strong="H8096"\w* feet \w or|strong="H3808"\w* trimmed \w his|strong="H8096"\w* mustache \w or|strong="H3808"\w* washed \w his|strong="H8096"\w* clothes \w from|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H4191"\w* day \w the|strong="H4191"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w had|strong="H4428"\w* left until \w the|strong="H4191"\w* day \w he|strong="H3808"\w* returned safely.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w came|strong="H3381"\w* \w from|strong="H4480"\w* Jerusalem \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w who|strong="H1121"\w* asked \w him|strong="H6213"\w*, “\w Mephibosheth|strong="H4648"\w*, \w why|strong="H3808"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* \w you|strong="H3117"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w me|strong="H4480"\w*?”

“\w My|strong="H1961"\w* lord \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*,” \w he|strong="H3588"\w* replied, “\w because|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w am|strong="H1961"\w* lame, \w I|strong="H3588"\w* said, ‘\w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w will|strong="H1961"\w* \w have|strong="H1961"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* donkey saddled \f + \fr 19:26 \ft LXX, Syriac, and Vulgate Saddle a donkey for me; Hebrew I will saddle a donkey for myself\f* \w so|strong="H1980"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w may|strong="H1961"\w* ride \w on|strong="H1980"\w* \w it|strong="H3588"\w* \w and|strong="H1980"\w* \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w with|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*.’ \w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H1961"\w* servant Ziba deceived \w me|strong="H5973"\w*,

\w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w has|strong="H4428"\w* slandered \w your|strong="H5921"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* lord \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*. \w Yet|strong="H3588"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* lord \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w is|strong="H4428"\w* \w like|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* angel \f + \fr 19:27 \ft Or Angel\f* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* God, \w so|strong="H3588"\w* do \w what|strong="H3588"\w* \w is|strong="H4428"\w* good \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w your|strong="H5921"\w* eyes.
